messages.content: I have a problem with my pc.

Chatbot: Please describe your problem and I will send your request to our 1st level support.
\Was the problem solved? If yes, please enter "yes" and you exit, else "no".
I does not turn on after i smashed it with a hammer

I'm sorry to hear that. Unfortunately, IT Solutions does not provide support for hardware damage caused by external factors. You may need to contact a local repair shop for assistance.
\Was the problem solved? If yes, please enter "yes" and you exit, else "no" and I will send the problem to our support team.
I will send your request to our support team! We will contact you as soon as possible.
